question: Recently, Which of the following company signs MoU with IISc to enhance infrastructure and broaden research activities?
explanation: Infosys Foundation signed a MoU with the Indian Institute of Science (IISc), Bangalore. The MoU between Infosys Foundation and Indian Institute of Science aims to improve infrastructure and broaden research activities at the Centre for Infectious Diseases Research (CIDR). It will focus on motivating researchers and train them to develop awareness about infectious diseases. It funds for Rs.5 crore has been allotted for the research.
